mapper.insert: insert into bph_alarm_handle_file (id, alarm_handle_id, type, path,url_path ,content_type,extension,file_name, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag,duration,thumbnail,md5_value) values (#{id}, #{alarmHandleId}, #{type}, #{path},#{urlPath},#{contentType},#{extension}, #{fileName}, #{createBy}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{remarks}, #{delFlag},#{duration},#{thumbnail},#{md5Value})
